dmca.title: Writer files a notice of infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madame,

I am writing to file a notice of infringement with Google.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.romeitalyholiday.com/trastevere_rome_apartments.htm
My article "Trastevere: The Heart of Rome" is located after the apartment listings.

Google and the administrator of this site may contact me at:

[private] [private]@Yahoo.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you,
[private]
